Title: Playstation 2 Recompilation Project Is Absolutely Incredible – RedGamingTech
Description: The PlayStation 2’s library is easily among the best of any console ever released, and even if you were to narrow down the list of games to the very best, you’d be left with dozens (more like hundreds) of incredible titles.

Title: Connect your past, present & future, with lines on a graph
Everyone Has Email. Almost Nobody Uses It Right
Description: A practical guide to mastering email - the most important tool on the internet. Learn why email still matters and how to use it effectively.

Title: iPhone Claude full stack dev - no VPN, no remote desktop
Description:

Title: How to, mostly, guarantee success in your career

Title: Something that I used to love
Description: One evening, over 13 years ago, I took some trivial CLI program the professor showed us that day and built an Android app out of it.

Title: Mozilla Slopaganda
Description: The one where I question reality

Title: Managing Through Reorganizations | Gergely Nemeth
Description: How to communicate reorganizations effectively: lead with direct conversations, own the narrative, and remember that how you treat people during change matters the most.

Title: The Dark Software Fabric: Engineering the Invisible System That Builds Your Software
Description: The verification hierarchy from the Ralph Loop is the theory. The Dark Software Fabric is the implementation — a layered enforcement system from type checking to autonomous AI agents that lets software get built 24/7 without sacrificing quality.

Title: The hidden costs of additions to a system
Description: In this sample chapter from Your Code Is Not The Most Important Thing In The World we explore the tendency towards adding complexity instead of reducing it

Title: Recovering SSH on a Headless Raspberry Pi Through a Privileged Docker Container
